message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient is in active labor with regular contractions and already at 5 cm dilation. There is no indication for pharmacotherapy at this time. Magnesium sulfate is used for prevention of seizures in preeclampsia and eclampsia, oxytocin is used to induce or augment labor, and terbutaline is used to stop preterm labor.
